CADalytics Creator Factory - Installation Instructions

QUICK START:
1. Extract: tar -xzf cadalytics-creator-factory.tar.gz
2. Install: npm install
3. Run: npm start
4. Open: http://localhost:3000

IFRAME EMBEDDING:
<iframe src="http://localhost:3000" width="100%" height="800px"></iframe>

FEATURES:
- Professional UI with dark/light themes
- Draggable cost estimator
- Enhanced graphics and animations
- CORS enabled for iframe embedding
- Session management
- Responsive design

SUPPORT:
For deployment issues, see README.md
Application ready for production use
